meanings: Noun being unspeakable, being staggering, being absurd

vlive.korean: 어? 성균관대가 상위권이네? 좀 어이가 없네, 이게 실화인가? Huh? Sungkyunkwan University was among the better teams? For real? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
vlive.english: Huh? Sungkyunkwan University was among the better teams? For real?
